0_100000_00000_00000_00000_00000_01001 //NOP
0_100010_00000_00000000000000000000    //MOVI  R0  =20'd0            R0 =dec 0
0_100010_00011_00000000000000000011    //MOVI  R3  =20'd3            R3 =dec 3
0_100000_00001_00011_00001_00000_01001 //SRLI  R1  =R3 >> 1          R1 =dec 1
0_100000_00010_00011_00001_00000_00001 //SUB   R2  =R3 - R1          R2 =dec 2
0_101011_00100_00011_000000000000111   //XORI  R4  =R3 ^ 15'b111     R4 =dec 4
0_101000_00101_00100_000000000000001   //ADDI  R5  =R4 + 15'b001     R5 =dec 5
0_100000_00110_00101_00001_00000_00000 //ADD   R6  =R5 + R1          R6 =dec 6    
0_100000_00111_00100_00011_00000_00100 //OR    R7  =R4 | R3          R7 =dec 7 
0_100000_01000_00100_00001_00000_01000 //SLLI  R8  =R4 << 1          R8 =dec 8
0_101100_10010_00010_000000000010010   //ORI   R18 =R2 | 15'b10010   R18=dec18 
0_100000_01001_10010_00001_00000_01011 //ROTRI R9  =R18 rotr 1       R9 =dec 9
0_100000_01010_00010_01000_00000_00011 //XOR   R10 =R2 ^ R8          R10=dec10
0_100010_10011_00000000000000011111    //MOVI  R19 =20'd31           R19=dec31  //b'11111
0_100010_10100_00000000000000001011    //MOVI  R20 =20'd11           R20=dec11  //b'01011
0_100000_01011_10011_10100_00000_00010 //AND   R11 =R19&R20          R11=dec11
0_100100_0_0000_0000_0000_0000_0000_0100 //J PC = PC +imm24<<1       Jump to "SWI   M[R0+0<<2] = R0"
0_100010_00001_00000000000000000011    //MOVI  R1  =20'd3            R1 =dec 3
0_001010_00000_00000_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R0+0<<2] = R0       M0 =dec 0
0_001010_00001_00001_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R1+0<<2] = R1       M1 =dec 1 //also check jump & SRLI success
0_001010_00010_00010_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R2+0<<2] = R2       M2 =dec 2
0_100010_10101_00000000000000000011    //MOVI  R21 =20'd3            R21=dec 3
0_100110_10101_00011_0_00000000000100  //BEQ if(R21==R3)PC = PC+imm14<<1 branch to "SW    M[R1+R1<<1] = R3"
0_100010_00001_00000000000000000011    //MOVI  R1  =20'd3            R1 =dec 3
0_011100_00011_00001_00001_01_00001010 //SW    M[R1+R1<<1] = R3      M3 =dec 3 
0_001010_00100_00100_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R4+0<<2] = R4       M4 =dec 4
0_001010_00101_00101_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R5+0<<2] = R5       M5 =dec 5
0_001010_00110_00110_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R6+0<<2] = R6       M6 =dec 6
0_001010_00111_00111_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R7+0<<2] = R7       M7 =dec 7
0_001010_01000_01000_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R8+0<<2] = R8       M8 =dec 8
0_001010_01001_01001_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R9+0<<2] = R9       M9 =dec 9
0_001010_01010_01010_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R10+0<<2] = R10     M10=dec10
0_001010_01011_01011_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R11+0<<2] = R11     M11=dec11
0_001010_10010_10010_000000000000000   //SWI   M[R18+0<<2] = R18     M18=dec18
0_000010_01100_00111_000000000000001   //LWI   R12 = M[R7+1<<2]      R12=M11 
0_011100_01101_00111_00001_10_00000010 //LW    R13 = M[R7+R1<<2]     R13=M11
0_001010_01100_01000_000000000000001   //SWI   M[R8+1<<2] = R12      M12=dec11
0_001010_01101_01001_000000000000001   //SWI   M[R9+1<<2] = R13      M13=dec11
0_100000_00000_00000_00000_00000_01001 //NOP
